answer:
Immunology segment net sales for the full year 2024, as reported, were USD 15.2 billion, representing a 24% growth compared to the full year 2023 immunology segment sales of USD 10.6 billion (from a December 31, 2023, date).

Cosentyx's net sales in the immunology segment for the full year 2024, reported and constant currency basis, were USD 6 billion (reported USD 13.15 billion, a 25% reported growth, and a 22% constant currency growth). These results were driven by new launches in healthcare specialty injections (HS), under the US IV launch. This included Xolair sales adjusted to immunology segment.
